meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Phil Costopolous Steve Hafner Rick Muenchow Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2730.

td.p: Phil Costopolous, a senior editor from Washington, D.C.
Steve Hafner, a church sexton from Seattle, Washington
Rick Muenchow, a consultant from Bethesda, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,200)

tr.td: BLACK AMERICA
SONGS OF THE '50s
MEDIEVAL FASHION
BIOLOGY
STATE CAPITALS
SPORTS
